page.title: 17ALL MY HOBBIES AT PORTESSIE
page.content: MY FIRST HOBBY IS SWIMMING. I LIKE SWIMMING BECAUSE I ENJOY IT. I LIKE THE WATER AND THE FLOATS. MY SECOND HOBBY IS WATCHING CARTOONS. MY FAVOURITE ONE IS ROAD RUNNER. IT IS ON EVERY SATURDAY, ON SATURDAY SUPERSTORE. FOR MY THIRD, I PLAY FOOTBALL. I PLAY WITH MY BROTHER AND SOME OTHER CHILDREN. ROLLER BOOTING IS MY FOURTH CHOICE. IT IS GOOD FUN. I LOVE PLAYING ON MY BIKE. I ENJOY PEDALING AND GOING OVER RAMPS. MY SIXTH HOBBY IS PLAYING HIDE AND SEEK. I LIKE HIDING FROM PEOPLE. I HAD A "CARTIE" AND I USED TO GO FOR RIDES BUT IT WAS WRECKED SO I AM GOING TO BUILD ANOTHER ONE. MY LAST HOBBY IS TO HAVE PILLOW FIGHTS WITH MY BROTHER. {BY NICOLA PHILIP.
